name: The Street- An Evening Taco Adventure Tour
description: The Street Taco Tour uncovers typical Vallarta street foods at night. We visit stands known and loved by locals, stands that have been around for generations.  You’ll experience the life of a local as you stroll the streets of Vallarta, stopping to eat outside, alongside regulars. In addition to street food, we visit two of Vallarta’s oldest Cenaduria restaurants, both proudly family-owned. The Street leaves you feeling more connected to Vallarta’s street food scene. After The Street Tour, you will feel more comfortable continuing to explore this wonderful city and its culinary magic. This tour is not recommended for vegetarians.
